name: GenCore - The Free OpenSource AntiVirus!
short_description: GenCore is a free open-source cross-platform AntiVirus created using Qt toolkit and was released in 2013 and is licensed under the GNU LGPL license. It was reinstated in 2014 by RpgSlayer after mjaoune abandoned the project in late 2013.

license.fullpath: License :: OSI-Approved Open Source :: GNU Library or Lesser General Public License version 2.0 (LGPLv2)
